channel.title: Webhosts
channel.description: I want to make a webclient for my server, I already have it .jar, and i'm new to webhosts, so which would you recommend that is cheap like under $5, reliable, and easy to use?

item.title: Webhosts
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:9, topic:399984”][quote author=laurent 248 link=topic=497084.msg3642566#msg3642566 date=1309122464]

how about free
x10hosting.com

Naw… the free host sucks. If there’s too much people visiting your website they will suspend your account.

They have a policy against shit ass websites

lol ok maybe I was using a subdomain to host my porn… Another for my host booters/botnets… And I didn’t add any css to it only some webclients single-page… But did they visit it? XD Anyway hosting24.com is pretty nice.
[/quote]Who allows legal porn hosting? I thought you needed a shooting license…[/quote]

No one allowed me I just hosted the videos I use without sharing

Read full topic

item.title: Webhosts
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

www.underhosts.co.uk

Fast, reliable servers, instant set-up on all of their products, so you can access your hosting straight away.
Extremely cheap aswell.
